turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you order me a cappuccino to pickup from Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK, which store do you want to go to?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Springwood Road in York

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: All right, what size cappuccino? Grande? Venti?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Venti

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK, what kind of milk do you take?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Definitely almond. I know they have almond.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, do you want an extra shot of espresso?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: YES! Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem. How long until you get to the store?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: About 10 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want them to add sugar?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No definitely not.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK. Do you get any other sweeteners?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, none of that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Any whipped cream or other flavors?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No I just want the espresso and almond milk. I'm a purist.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: All good. The order is placed. It will be ready at Springwood Rd in 10.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks! I'll see you at the office later.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem. See you later.
